<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Raktavarna](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3160)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Raktavarnas are simple rakshasa incarnations of betrayal and assassination, often existing to test the mettle of those who were treacherous or poisonous in a previous life. They typically appear as a snake with blood-red eyes and oversized fangs, though they just as often appear in the guise of a sword or a piece of jewelry.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Raktavarna.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Raktavarna](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3160)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Rakshasa" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=768" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=737" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +7, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

+2 status to all saves vs. [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579) magic
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

**Weaknesses**
[holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) 3

**Knowledge of Delusion** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579)) A creature that fails a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) check or a Perception check to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=2302) on a rakshasa is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) until the end of its next turn.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus raktavarna venom

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 16
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45)
- **4th**
[Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247)

**Betraying Bite**   A raktavarna gains a +2 bonus to Strikes against any creature that is holding it.

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=55)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127)) The raktavarna takes on the appearance of a Tiny inanimate object. If, while transformed, the raktavarna takes any action other than the purely mental (such as [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367)), they immediately revert to their original form. Until then, they can use [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=2388) the object.

**Designate Master**  ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66)) The raktavarna spends 10 minutes on an invocation alongside another creature. That creature becomes the raktavarna's master until the raktavarna dies or Dismisses the effect. The master gains the Master's Eyes activity as long as the bond lasts.

**Master's Eyes** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Scrying](/Traits.aspx?ID=141)) The master observes the world through the raktavarna's eyes instead of their own, using the raktavarna's Perception and [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59). This lasts until the end of the master's next turn, but the master can Sustain the activity. This ability functions at any range, even on different planes of existence. If the raktavarna dies while their master is using this ability, the master is [stunned 5](/Conditions.aspx?ID=93).

**Raktavarna Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d4 poison damage and stupefied 2 (1 round).

</column>
